scripts.build:css: mkdir -p dist/fonts && cp -R src/fonts/Source_Code_Pro dist/fonts/ && npx tailwindcss -i src/input.css -o dist/css/main.css
scripts.build:css:prod: mkdir -p dist/fonts && cp -R src/fonts/Source_Code_Pro dist/fonts/ && npx tailwindcss -i src/input.css -o dist/css/main.css --minify
scripts.watch:css: mkdir -p dist/fonts && cp -R src/fonts/Source_Code_Pro dist/fonts/ && npx tailwindcss -i src/input.css -o dist/css/main.css --watch
